img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/20/Wukong_MiddleHollow_23.jpg)
There's also another green Wisp around the back of the house behind more cocoons, but one of the large cocoons behind it hides a Puppet Spider.
img_below_text:
Outside the house, look ahead to spot a purple glowing altar to the right of the main path. As you approach, the mysterious lady will appear again, unable to grab the talisman placed on the altar.
She'll warn you to leave things alone, and bid you to find your friend instead. Since we're not much for following orders, go ahead and remove the Talisman from the purple altar, and keep your eyes out for more in this chapter - they'll help us unlock a big secret!

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 23 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong MiddleHollow 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/20/Wukong_MiddleHollow_23.jpg)
There's also another green Wisp around the back of the house behind more cocoons, but one of the large cocoons behind it hides a Puppet Spider."
            - Following Text: "Outside the house, look ahead to spot a purple glowing altar to the right of the main path. As you approach, the mysterious lady will appear again, unable to grab the talisman placed on the altar.
She'll warn you to leave things alone, and bid you to find your friend instead. Since we're not much for following orders, go ahead and remove the Talisman from the purple altar, and keep your eyes out for more in this chapter - they'll help us unlock a big secret!"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, eerie cave environment with ancient, pagoda-like structures and glowing flames. In the foreground, a mysterious purple altar emits a spectral glow. This scene is part of a walkthrough in the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where players encounter a green Wisp and a Puppet Spider behind a house, and later, a mysterious lady near the purple altar who warns them to leave things alone and find their friend. The altar is significant for unlocking secrets in the chapter.
